item.title: BK
item.description: score:-23 Chances: BNY Mellon launches an open banking payments solution, Bankify, indicating a move towards modern banking technology. BNY Mellon appoints Sinead Colton-Grant as Chief Investment Officer, showcasing strategic leadership changes. BNY Mellon joins the FedNowÂ® Service, advancing the U.S. payment system, which could lead to new opportunities.
